Merchant Jackson:

Bathis said that he really appreciates warriors who have studied spiders and know how to dispatch them quickly. I think you can gain the necessary experience if you hunt spiders near Gludio.

You will get the hang of it quickly. Kill 30 spiders, and you'll have the necessary experience. Spiders dwell to the west from here. It's pretty far if you go on foot.

If you decide to go, I'll teleport you there.
